Description: You pace back and forth, putting together the information you know about the Elder Wand. You know it´s said to have been created by Death itself, as a gift for a man defying his destined death. You know its made with elderwood and has a core of thestral tail hairs. The key to repairing it must be...

Options.Name: ...to find the materials its made from, and use alchemy to repair it
...to make a deal with Death, to request it to repair the wand it once created

Description: You need to find elderwood and thestral tail hairs. Then you need to find a talented enough alchemist to repair it.

Eldertrees are very rare, and because of their magical properties, well hidden. You decide it´s more likely to find an object made from elderwood. You immediately think an old friend that collects all kinds of magical objects and materials.

You wait until the weekend, and you take the train to the village where your friend lives; Ottery St. Catchpole. You walk through the village, to an open field a few minutes away. Suddenly you see a familiar house, and a familiar person sitting outside on the porch. They stand up and greet you, with a surprised and excited look.
Terra Lovegood smiles wide, and asks you what you´re doing here.

Options.Name: Tell her about the Elder Wand
Tell her you need the material for your class

Description: She nods and smiles through your whole story, and at the end, you´re convinced she doesn´t believe you. She laughs and disappears into the house.

Options.Name: Wait for her to come back

Description: She returns with a wooden box in her hands, and she holds it out for you to take. You grab the box and notice the wood it´s made out of; elderwood.

Options.Name: Thank her, and go back to Hogwarts

Description: On the train back you read about thestrals. You have never seen one before, but you know there are some on Hogwarts grounds. After reading for a while you heart sinks. You can only see a thestral if you´ve seen someone die.

Options.Name: Go to St:Mungos hospital and look for a dying person

Description: You get off the train near St:Mungos, and enter the hospital. You walk through the corridors, looking at the sick people. Suddenly, you see an ald man, gasping for air.

Options.Name: Get him help, and save him
Do nothing, and let him die

Description: You call for help, but no one comes. You run to the old man and grab him, trying to save him. You ask him what´s wrong but he can´t make a sound. Suddenly, his face turns blue and his body gets limp. The man is dead.

Options.Name: Leave, and go back to Hogwarts

Description: You call for help, but no one comes. You run to the old man and grab him, trying to save him. You ask him what´s wrong but he can´t make a sound. Suddenly, his face turns blue and his body gets limp. The man is dead.

Options.Name: Leave, and go back to Hogwarts

Description: You step into the room and close the door. The old man gives you a terrified look, before his face turns blue and he stops moving. The man is dead.

Options.Name: Leave, and go back to Hogwarts

Options.Name: Thank her, and go back to Hogwarts

Description: On the train back you read about thestrals. You have never seen one before, but you know there are some on Hogwarts grounds. After reading for a while your eyes stick to a certain sentence. You can only see a thestral if you´ve seen someone die.

You look around the train car. There is only one other person here. You pull out your wand and walk towards them. You look them in the eyes as the words Avada Kedavra leaves your mouth, and they sink into their seat without a sound. You killed them.

Options.Name: Leave the train car, and go back to Hogwarts
